name: In
description: Read from an audio or control bus. Reads signals from a specified bus.

name: Out
description: Write to an audio or control bus. Writes signals to a specified bus.

inputs.name: channelsArray
inputs.description: Signal(s) to write to the bus

name: ReplaceOut
description: Replace bus contents. Replaces instead of mixing with existing bus contents.

name: OffsetOut
description: Write to a bus with sample accurate timing. Like Out but with sub-sample timing precision.

name: LocalIn
description: Read from the previous cycle of a local bus. Creates a feedback loop within a synth.

name: LocalOut
description: Write to local bus for use in the next cycle. Used with LocalIn for feedback loops.

inputs.name: channelsArray
inputs.description: Signal(s) to write to local bus

name: InFeedback
description: Read from a bus with a one block delay. Like In but reads from the previous calculation block.

name: XOut
description: Crossfading bus output. Crossfades between existing bus contents and new signal.

inputs.name: xfade
inputs.description: Crossfade amount (0=leave bus unchanged, 1=replace with new signal)

name: SoundIn
description: Read from hardware audio input. Convenient wrapper around In for reading from sound card inputs.
